item.title: [Access Control] [East Asia] [Red] Connectivity issues in Asia Pacific
item.description: Apr 28 2012 9:00AM We are experiencing an issue with Windows Azure connectivity in the Asia Pacific region. At this time customers may experience connection timeouts or failures for all Windows Azure Platform services in this region. Further updates will be published to keep you apprised of the situation. Please refer to the Windows Azure Compute service feed for future updates on this matter. We apologize for any inconvenience this causes our customers.

item.title: [Access Control] [East Asia] [Red] Connectivity issues in Asia Pacific
item.description:
Apr 28 2012 9:00AM We are experiencing an issue with Windows Azure connectivity in the Asia Pacific region. At this time customers may experience connection timeouts or failures for all Windows Azure Platform services in this region. Further updates will be published to keep you apprised of the situation. Please refer to the Windows Azure Compute service feed for future updates on this matter. We apologize for any inconvenience this causes our customers.
Apr 28 2012 11:23AM The repair steps have been executed and successfully validated. Full connectivity has been restored in the Asia Pacific region. We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused our customers.
